DatasourceConfigurer.description: The fully qualified name of a class implementing org.appng.core.repository.config.DatasourceConfigurer, which is responsible for JDBC connection-pooling. Supported are 'org.appng.core.repository.config.HikariCPConfigurer' and 'org.appng.core.repository.config.TomcatJdbcConfigurer'

allowSkipRender.description: Allow skipping of the render phase using render=false for the manager GUI or the XSLT based rendering of taglets.

appendTabId.description: If set to true, the name of the currently selected tab is being appended to the URL as a get-parameter. Addresses the issue that IE loses the anchor on a redirect.

assetsDir.description: A semicolon-separated list of folder-names (relative to 'wwwDir') containing static resources such as images or pdfs

authApplication.description: The name of the application which is responsible for the authentication

authLoginPage.description: The names of the login-pages (comma-separated) within the application defined in 'authApplication'. The number of comma-separated pages must be the same as in 'authLoginRef', because 'authLoginRef[n]' refers to 'authLoginPage[n]'!

authLoginRef.description: The action names (comma-separated) for the pages defined in {@link #AUTH_LOGIN_PAGE}. The number of comma-separated names must be the same as in 'authLoginPage', because 'authLoginRef[n]' refers to 'authLoginPage[n]'!

authLogoutActionName.description: The name for the parameter defining the action on the logout-page

authLogoutActionValue.description: The value for the parameter defining the action on the logout-page

authLogoutPage.description: The name of the logout-page within the application defined in 'authApplication'

csrfProtectedMethods.description: a comma-separated list of HTTP-methods to enable CSRF protection for

csrfProtectedPaths.description: a comma-separated list of path-prefixes to enable CSRF protection for

csrfProtectionEnabled.description: Set to true to enable CSRF-protection for this site

defaultApplication.description: The application to be called after a successful login

defaultPage.description: The name of the default-page (without extension) relative to one of the directories defined in 'documentDir'

defaultPageSize.description: The default page size (items per page)

documentDir.description: A semicolon-separated list of folder-names (relative to 'wwwDir') containing JSP-files and static resources

ehcacheBlockingTimeout.description: The time, in milliseconds, to wait for the filter before a LockTimeoutException is thrown

ehcacheClearOnShutdown.description: Whether or not the Ehcache is cleared on a site shutdown/reload

ehcacheEnabled.description: Set to true to enable Ehcache for this site

ehcacheExceptions.description: URL path prefixes which are never cached. Contains one prefix per line (CLOB value).

ehcacheStatistics.description: Set to true to enable Ehcache statistics

enforcePrimaryDomain.description: Set to true to enforce the protocol used by the site (http or https)

errorPage.description: The name of the default error-page (without extension) relative to 'wwwDir'

errorPages.description: The name of the error-page per document-directory (see 'documentDir'), multiple entries separated by a pipe (|)

host.description: The host of the site. For convenience only, do not change!

indexConfig.description: For each directory defined in 'documentDir', there can be defined which locale and which Lucene-analyzer to use for indexing.

indexDir.description: The folder containing the Lucene-Index, relative to 'wwwDir'

indexFileSystemQueueSize.description: the queue size used per directory when indexing the file system

indexFileTypes.description: A list of comma-separated file-extensions (without leading dot) which are being indexed

indexQueueSize.description: The queue size used for document indexing

indexTimeout.description: The timeout in milliseconds for indexing

ldapDomain.description: The Domain for the LDAP authentication

ldapHost.description: The LDAP host in provider URL format ("ldap(s)://<host>:<port>"). Note that you might need to add CA certificates to the truststore of the executing JVM if you enable "ldaps://".

ldapIdAttribute.description: The name of the LDAP-attribute containing the user-id used for authentication

ldapPrincipalScheme.description: How the LDAP principal is built from a given username when logging in. ["DN": results in "${site.ldapIdAttribute}=<username>,${site.ldapUserBaseDn}" - "UPN": results in "<username>@${site.ldapDomain}" - "SAM": results in "${site.ldapDomain}\\<username>"]. "UPN" and "SAM" are ActiveDirectory specific and "SAM" is the default to stay backward compatible.

ldapStartTls.description: Use STARTTLS for the LDAP connection. If you set this to "true" the value of ${site.ldapHost} should begin with "ldap://" (not "ldaps://"), because STARTTLS and LDAP over SSL (which is used when "ldaps://" is in place) are mutually exclusive.

ldapUser.description: The name of the LDAP service-user for general LDAP lookups. If the value is a Distinguished Name (e.g. "cn=Service User,dc=mycompany,dc=com") it will be used directly as LDAP principal. Otherwise the principal will be derived according to the value specified for ${site.ldapPrincipalScheme}.

ldapUserBaseDn.description: The base-DN which is used to map a plain username to a Distinguished Name, if "DN" is used as principal scheme (see property "ldapPrincipalScheme").

locale.description: The default locale for the site. Use one of java.util.Locale.getAvailableLocales()

mailDisabled.description: Set to 'true' to disable mailing and log the e-mails instead.

name.description: The name of the site. For convenience only, do not change!

rewriteConfig.description: the location of the rewrite rules for UrlRewriteFilter (http://tuckey.org/urlrewrite), relative to 'siteRootDir'.

searchChunkSize.description: The chunksize (items per page) for the search-tag

searchMaxHits.description: The maximum number of hits for the search-tag

service-path.description: The path-suffix for the services offered by appNG (such as Webservices, SOAP, Actions, Datasources)

serviceOutputFormat.description: The output format to be used when actions/datasources are being called through service URLs

serviceOutputType.description: The output type to be used when actions/datasources are being called through service URLs

siteRootDir.description: The absolute path to the sites root-directory

supportReloadFile.description: If true, a site reload is performed when a file named .reload is created in the site's root directory.

supportedLanguages.description: A comma-separated list of the languages supported by the site.

tagPrefix.description: The prefix used for the appNG JSP-tags.

template.description: The name of the template to use

timeZone.description: The default timezone for the site. Use one of java.util.TimeZone.getAvailableIDs().

wwwDir.description: The name of the folder containing the web-contents, relative to 'repositoryPath' configured at the platform

xssExceptions.description: URL path prefixes where XSS protection is omitted. Contains one prefix per line (CLOB value). Supports blank lines and comments (#).

bearerToken.description: shared secret for the job records rest API. API is not available if this property is blank

enableJobRecord.description: so to false to disable that scheduler saves records for each job execution

indexTimeout.description: The timeout in milliseconds when indexing files

quartzClusterCheckinInterval.description: the intervall in ms to check for failed jobs on the cluster

quartzIsClustered.description: set to true to enable quartz clustering support

recordLifeTime.description: life time of job record entries before getting erased from the database. Leaf blank for endless life time

aspectRatio.description: the aspect ratio (width/height) for search result images, with a precisons of 0.0001

downloadImageHeight.description: the height for an image that belongs to a download

downloadImageWidth.description: the width for an image that belongs to a download

emailNotifyEnabled.description: whether or not e-mail notifications about new requests are enabled or not

emailNotifyRoles.description: a comma-separated list of role names to notify about new requests

emailNotifySender.description: the sender address for the notification e-mail

emailNotifySubject.value: [PROMISE ${project}] - A new request has been placed
emailNotifySubject.defaultValue: [PROMISE ${project}] - A new request has been placed
emailNotifySubject.description: the subject for the e-mail notification

emailNotifySubjectGlobal.description: the subject for the e-mail notification

emailNotifyTemplate.value:
Hello ${user},
${requestor} has requested the ${type} ${itemName} (${originalName}) for variant ${project}/${variant}.
Go to this URL to edit this request:
${url}
emailNotifyTemplate.description: the freemarker template for sending request notifications

emailNotifyTemplateGlobal.value:
Dear ${user},

the user ${requestor} of variant ${project}/${variant} requested to add the product ${originalName} to the global product database.

Please have a look at PROMISE!
Go to this URL to edit the product:
${url}

Thank you!
emailNotifyTemplateGlobal.description: the freemarker template for sending the notification about a new product

forceAspectRatio.description: set to true to force the aspect ratio for search preview images

imageCacheFolder.description: the absolute path to the image cache folder

imageGalleryHeight.description: the height of an image displayed in a gallery

imageGalleryWidth.description: the width of an image displayed in a gallery

imageIndexPreviewHeight.description: the width of an image for the search preview

imageIndexPreviewWidth.description: the height of an image for the search preview

imagePreviewCropHeight.description: the height of an image for variant editing

imagePreviewCropWidth.description: the width of an image for variant editing

imagePreviewHeight.description: the height of a preview image displayed in the editing mode

imagePreviewWidth.description: the width of a preview image displayed in the editing mode

imageQuickSearchHeight.description: the width of an image for the quick search

imageQuickSearchWidth.description: the height of an image for the quick search

imageSearchPageHeight.description: the height of an image displayed on the product search page

imageSearchPageWidth.description: the width of an image displayed on the product search page

imageTableHeight.description: the height of an image displayed in a table

imageTableWidth.description: the width of an image displayed in a table

imageVariantAspectRatio.description: the aspect ratio for image variants (w/h)

indexQueueSize.description: the queue size when indexing recipes/products

maxTextLength.description: the maximum text length displayed when searching products

pdfExportCommand.description: the command to export the wishlist as pdf

pdfFileName.description: the name of thw wishlist pdf

productPreviewPage.description: the (absolute or relative) path to the product preview page, using <variantId> and <productId> as placeholders

propertyDefaultHeight.description: the default height for an image property, used when the assigned position has no height specified

propertyDefaultWidth.description: the default width for an image property, used when the assigned position has no width specified

recipePreviewImageHeight.description: height for the recipe image in preview

recipePreviewImageWidth.description: width for the recipe image in preview

recipePreviewPage.description: the (absolute or relative) path to the recipe preview page

restServicePreviewSize.description: image size for search result picture

searchTermTransform.description: how to transform the lucene search term

specialOfferPropertyName.description: the name of the custom property used to mark a product as special offer

videoPreviewImageAspectRatio.description: The aspect ratio for video preview images, must use 4 decimal digits (16:9 = 1.7777)

clusterInterfaceName.description: the name of the network interface who's first assigned IP address is used as system property appng.node.id in case it was not set an JVM startup

databaseReportReceivers.description: a semicolon separted list of receviers for DatabaseReportJob, additional to all users with role 'Database report receiver'

databaseReportSender.description: the sender for the database report email

databaseReportSubject.description: the subject for the database report email

databaseReportText.value: See attached file for a report of the database related platform events.
databaseReportText.defaultValue: See attached file for a report of the database related platform events.
databaseReportText.description: the text for the database report email

eventReportReceivers.description: a semicolon separted list of receviers for PlatformEventReportJob, additional to all users with role 'Event report receiver'

eventReportSender.description: the sender for the event report email

eventReportSubject.description: the subject for the event report email

eventReportText.value: See attached file for a report of the recent appNG platform events.
eventReportText.defaultValue: See attached file for a report of the recent appNG platform events.
eventReportText.description: the text for the event report email

eventReportTypes.value: CREATE UPDATE DELETE INFO ERROR WARN
eventReportTypes.defaultValue: CREATE UPDATE DELETE INFO ERROR WARN
eventReportTypes.description: the event types to be included in the even report email (CREATE, UPDATE, DELETE, INFO, ERROR, WARN)

digestLoginRedirectWithServletPath.description: set to true to redirect to the original servlet path after a digest login (without query params)

digestMaxValidity.description: the maximum validity of a login digest in minutes

enableDeeplinks.description: set to true to forward the user to the originally requested page

mailFrom.description: the sender address for emails send during passwort retrieval

successPage.description: The path the user is forwarded to after successfull login
